column2:
Test Name: screen_config
Test Tag: 1
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Next we will configure the camera for the remaining tests.
Press OK when the clip is on the screen with no overlay

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - Dots Pattern
    Preset Picture Setting - aps
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - default
screen_config

Test Name: stabilization
Test Tag: 2
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

This test repeats until TV power output is stable or until 6 iterations is reached (minimum 2 iterations).
* When ready begin the IEC SDR clip and press the OK button when the test clip content begins at the end of the countdown.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - IEC SDR
    Preset Picture Setting - aps
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - default

Test Name: camera_ccf_default
Test Tag: 3
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Change the video clip to ccf
* When ready begin the ccf clip and press the OK button when the test clip content begins at the end of the countdown.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - ccf
    Preset Picture Setting - aps
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - default
default

Test Name: camera_ccf_brightest
Test Tag: 4
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Change the preset picture setting to vivid
* When ready begin the ccf clip and press the OK button when the test clip content begins at the end of the countdown.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - ccf
    Preset Picture Setting - vivid
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - brightest
brightest

Test Name: camera_ccf_hdr10_default
Test Tag: 5
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Change the preset picture setting to standard
* When ready begin the ccf clip and press the OK button when the test clip content begins at the end of the countdown.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - ccf
    Preset Picture Setting - standard
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - hdr10_default
hdr10_default

Test Name: lum_profile
Test Tag: 6
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Next we will capture the luminance profile of the TV.
* When ready begin the Luminance Profile clip and press the OK button when the test clip content begins at the end of the countdown.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - Luminance Profile
    Preset Picture Setting - aps
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - default
default

Test Name: default
Test Tag: 7
Test Time (seconds): 600

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Change the video clip to IEC SDR
* When ready begin the IEC SDR clip and press the OK button when the test clip content begins at the end of the countdown.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - IEC SDR
    Preset Picture Setting - aps
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - default
default

Test Name: default_low_backlight
Test Tag: 8
Test Time (seconds): 600

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Lower the backlight setting to the lowest possible level and record this level.
* When ready begin the IEC SDR clip and press the OK button when the test clip content begins at the end of the countdown.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - IEC SDR
    Preset Picture Setting - aps
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Lowest Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - default
default

Test Name: brightest
Test Tag: 9
Test Time (seconds): 600

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Change the preset picture setting to vivid
* When ready begin the IEC SDR clip and press the OK button when the test clip content begins at the end of the countdown.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - IEC SDR
    Preset Picture Setting - vivid
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - brightest
brightest

Test Name: brightest_low_backlight
Test Tag: 10
Test Time (seconds): 600

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Lower the backlight setting to the lowest possible level and record this level.
* When ready begin the IEC SDR clip and press the OK button when the test clip content begins at the end of the countdown.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - IEC SDR
    Preset Picture Setting - vivid
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Lowest Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - brightest
brightest

Test Name: hdr10
Test Tag: 11
Test Time (seconds): 300

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Change the video clip to CLASP HDR
* Change the preset picture setting to standard
* When ready begin the CLASP HDR clip and press the OK button when the test clip content begins at the end of the countdown.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - CLASP HDR
    Preset Picture Setting - standard
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Default Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - hdr10_default
hdr10_default

Test Name: hdr10_low_backlight
Test Tag: 12
Test Time (seconds): 300

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Lower the backlight setting to the lowest possible level and record this level.
* When ready begin the CLASP HDR clip and press the OK button when the test clip content begins at the end of the countdown.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The conditions for the current test should be:

    Video Clip - CLASP HDR
    Preset Picture Setting - standard
    Automatic Brightness Control (ABC) - Off
    Backlight Setting - Lowest Level
    Motion Detection Dimming (MDD) - Off (if applicable)
    ccf_pps - hdr10_default
hdr10_default

Test Name: standby
Test Tag: 13
Test Time (seconds): 2400

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* The next test will be a standby test.
* Ensure that QuckStart is set to Off (if applicable).
* Power down the TV using the remote and press the OK button to begin test.

Test Name: waketime
Test Tag: 14
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Now that the standby test is complete we are going to measure wake time.
* Press the OK button at the same time as you press the power button to turn on the television.
* A new message will appear asking you to press another button as soon as the TV has become responsive to input.
As soon as the TV becomes responsive to input press the OK button.

Test Name: standby_echo
Test Tag: 15
Test Time (seconds): 2400

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* The next test will be a standby test.
* Connect the TV to the Amazon Echo
* Ensure that QuckStart is set to Default Out of Box Setting.
* Power down the TV using the remote and press the OK button to begin test.

Test Name: echo_waketime
Test Tag: 16
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Now that the standby test is complete we are going to measure wake time.
* Press the OK button at the same time as you press the power button to turn on the television.
* A new message will appear asking you to press another button as soon as the TV has become responsive to input.
As soon as the TV becomes responsive to input press the OK button.

Test Name: standby_google
Test Tag: 17
Test Time (seconds): 2400

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* The next test will be a standby test.
* Connect the TV to the Google Home
* Ensure that QuckStart is set to Default Out of Box Setting.
* Power down the TV using the remote and press the OK button to begin test.

Test Name: google_waketime
Test Tag: 18
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instructions:

* Now that the standby test is complete we are going to measure wake time.
* Press the OK button at the same time as you press the power button to turn on the television.
* A new message will appear asking you to press another button as soon as the TV has become responsive to input.
As soon as the TV becomes responsive to input press the OK button.
